column4: hey guys need to know how to enable visual effects when i try to do it it says desktop effects could not be enabled  plus i cant set my resolution above 800x600 anyone got any ideas its an intel945 chipset
you have not got video drivers installed and/or configured
what is the output of: lspci | grep -i vga
if you run: gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
you can find the very small section with one line that says Identifier "Configured video device"
and under that but above EndSection add the line:  Driver   "intel"
save the new file and reboot
thats the failsafe driver, you want to use intel
if it doesnt work then boot to grub
and select recovery mode, select root, you can then use vi or nano to edit it back
just change "vesa" to "intel"
